data.title: Lynchburg Circuit Court
data.text:
Clerk

Hon. Kenneth T. Swisher

Phone/Fax

Phone: (434) 455-2620

Judge's Office: 434-455-2600

Fax: (434) 847-1864

Fax: Criminal Fax: 434-455-0041

Clerk's Office Hours

8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

Address

P. O. Box 4

900 Court Street

Lynchburg, VA 24505-0004

***Cash registers close at 4:15 p.m. No monetary transactions after 4:15 p.m.***

***Land record recordings taken between 8:30 a.m. and 4:15 p.m.***

***Passports taken between 8:30 a.m. and 3:30 p.m.***

***Marriage Licenses taken between 9:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. Appointments are encouraged.***

Please send all mail to P.O. Box 4, Lynchburg, VA 24505.

Mail addressed to the street address may not be delivered in a timely manner.
